ARABIC: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ مَهْدًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is He who made the earth a cradle for you and made pathways for you in it so that hopefully you would be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He who made the earth a bed for you, and laid out tracks upon it so that you may find the way;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He it is Who made this earth for you a cradle and made in it pathways for you that you may find the way to your destination;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who has made the earth for you as a cradle and has made roads therein so that you will perhaps seek guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The One Who made the earth a bed you, and made roads for you in it, so that you may be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who has made for you the earth like a bed, and has made for you roads therein, in order that you may find your way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He Who made the earth a resting-place for you, and made in it ways for you that you may go aright;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He who appointed the earth to be a cradle for you, and appointed ways for you therein, that haply you may be guided;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who made the earth a resting-place for you, and placed roads for you therein, that haply ye may find your way;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Who has made the earth a cradle for you and made thereon paths for you so that, hopefully, you may find your way
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who hath made for you the earth a bed, and hath made for you paths therein that haply ye may be directed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He, who made the earth a cradle for you, and made for you in it ways so that you may be guided [to your destinations],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Yea, the same that) has made for you the earth (like a carpet) spread out, and has made for you roads (and channels) therein, in order that ye may find guidance (on the way);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who has made for you the earth like a bed, and has made for you roads therein, in order that you may find your way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (It is) He who made the earth to be a cradle for you and made in it ways for you, in order that you are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He who made the earth a habitat for you, and traced pathways for you on it, that you may be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [The one] who has made for you the earth a bed and made for you upon it roads that you might be guided
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:10] He Who made the earth a cradle for you, a flat resting-place, like a child’s cradle, and placed for you therein ways, routes, that perhaps you may be guided, to your destinations during your travels;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah says: yes, He created them Him (Who made the earth a resting place for you, and placed roads for you therein, that haply ye may find your way) by means of the roads;
